template.comment:
ERROR: fatal error
Odd number of electrons in closed-shell orbitals
Total number of electrons: 129 Number of closed-shell electrons: 129 Number of open-shell electrons: 0 Number of GVB pair electrons: 0
Multiplicity: 1 Molecular charge: 0
Please check the input file for incorrect spin multiplicity (multip), incorrect molecular charge (molchg), or missing atoms in the geometry.
------------------------------------------------------------ Jaguar cannot recover from this error and will now abort. For technical support please contact:
Email: help@schrodinger.com Phone: 503-299-1150 Fax: 503-299-4532 ------------------------------------------------------------
